name: Failed Experiment
flavor: A magical necromantic experiment gone wrong, leaving them warped and ungainly.

features.name: Warped Fortitude - Passive
features.desc: The Experiment is resistant to physical damage.

features.name: Overwhelm - Passive
features.desc: When a target the Experiment attacks has other adversaries within Very Close range, the Experiment deals double damage.

features.name: Lurching Lunge - Action
features.desc: Mark a Stress to spotlight the Experiment as an additional GM move instead of spending Fear.
